about_us_info: In order to further increase the activity of students in public life, discover their talents and further develop through self-improvement, more than 15 clubs and public organizations have been created at the Tashkent Institute of Management and Economics, in which more than 500 students take an active part. Clubs and teams provide direct assistance to students in meaningful organization of extracurricular activities.
about_first_year: At IE University, we look for driven and unique individuals who can add value to our community and we would not want these unforeseen circumstances to get in the way, yet make room to innovate!

discover_card_description: There’s never a dull moment in the bustling capital of Spain. Get a feel for what student life is like at our fast-paced Madrid campus.

entrance_description: Start your academic journey at our university, where you'll pave the way to a brighter future filled with endless opportunities and personal growth
no_information_found_for_the_request_ple: No information found for the request. Please try again
about_description: To date, the Institute cooperates with international universities and educational organizations in Uzbekistan and abroad, and provides educational programs, Foundation and training and retraining programs at Bachelor's and master's degrees.
university_description: TMII University has immersive on-site locations in two cities: fast-paced, cosmopolitan Madrid and the charming historic city of Segovia. Discover everything that each has to offer.
information_about_passport_description: These parts of the passport must be present when you upload the passport. There should be a general part of them, as well as a part with information about the place of residence.
terms_and_conditions_agree_description: I acknowledge and accept full responsibility for completing and submitting my application accurately and in its entirety. Any omission or inaccurate information provided in this application or in the accompanying documents may lead to the rejection of my application. I understand that I have only one opportunity to register for admission. I am fully aware of and committed to complying with all the regulations regarding discipline and examination conduct at TMC Institute. Throughout the admission process and, if successful, during my studies, I will treat my peers, university administration, and lecturers with respect and professionalism. I understand that any violation of the rules and regulations of TMC Institute in Tashkent, or displaying a disrespectful attitude towards my peers, university administration, or lecturers, may result in the rejection of my application or the termination of my contract. By agreeing to these terms, I acknowledge the importance of adhering to the principles outlined above and understand the potential consequences of non-compliance.

entrance_exam_title: To be eligible to participate in the TMII Entrance Test, candidates are required to complete the following steps:
entrance_exam_condition_one: Registration: Candidates must complete the registration process for the test.
entrance_exam_condition_two: Payment of Registration Fee: The registration fee can be paid through various methods, including Payme, Click, and UZUM applications, or at the nearest bank.

confirmation_description:
Your
        application form has been succesfully filled out and submitted. Admission committee will soon allocoate
        neccessary efforts in order review your application. Once the team is finished with considering your candidate
        and decides that you all the criteria, we will contact you in no time. Stay tuned. Good luck!
